summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4252 for the improvement of West Orchard Street from California Avenue to 39th Avenue Southwest; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 50536, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
